title: docs: bad link to type identity under Struct types
body:
by **korylprince**: 
On the current spec:
http://golang.org/ref/spec

the link to "type identity" under heading "Struct types" points to
"http://golang.org/ref/Type_identity"; when it should point to
"http://golang.org/ref/spec#Type_identity";.

Context:
"The tags are made visible through a reflection interface and take part in type
identity for structs but are otherwise ignored."
